products.title: Radiant Renewal Eye Recovery Pro
products.body_html:
This anti-aging eye mask features our most powerful concentration of light therapy including Red, Deep Red, Near-Infrared, and Amber light to address the many signs of aging around the delicate eye area.

The FDA-cleared mask is easy to use, requiring just 3 minutes per session. Made from lightweight, flexible, medical-grade silicone, it is adjustable and hands-free.

products.title: 4-in-1 Advanced Skincare Wand (V1)
products.body_html: The SolaWave Wand is an advanced skincare tool that combines 4 powerful dermatological technologies together for the first time for at-home use - Microcurrent, Red Light Therapy, Therapeutic Warmth, and Facial massage. The SolaWave Wand is rechargeable, portable, and comes in a range of colors so your personality (and skin) can shine on-the-go and at any time.

products.title: Magnetic Charging Cord Replacement for Radiant Renewal Skincare Wand
Radiant Renewal 2-in-1 Skincare Mini
products.body_html: This anti-aging skincare tool for face and body combines Red and Near-Infrared Light Therapies with Therapeutic Warmth to help support healthy collagen, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. It visibly improves firmness and elasticity, enhances radiance, and soothes, revives, and de-puffs for healthier-looking, glowing skin.

products.title: Wrinkle Retreat Light Therapy Face Mask
products.body_html:
Red Light Therapy is well-proven to address the visible signs of aging on the face.

This FDA-cleared Mask reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.

Improve firmness and elasticity and enhance your skin’s overall radiance with this 10-minute treatment, thanks to the combined powers of Red and Near-Infrared Light Therapies.

products.title: Neck & Chest Rejuvenating Mask
products.body_html:
Your neck and chest are where the visible effects of sun exposure and elasticity loss show up most — yet, these delicate areas are often overlooked. This science-backed rechargeable LED Mask combines targeted Red and Near-Infrared Light Therapies to give your neck and chest the attention they deserve. 

Red Light Therapy works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and creases, while Near-Infrared Light deeply restores and rejuvenates — revealing radiant, youthful-looking skin.

Made from flexible, medical-grade silicone that hugs the contours of your neck, the Mask has an adjustable, lightweight design that’s easy to wear and comfortable for every body. Plus, it’s portable, rechargeable, and hands-free — so you can treat your skin whenever, wherever you want.

products.title: Radiant Renewal Skincare Wand Replacement Carrying Case
products.body_html: Replacement charging case for the Solawave Radiant Renewal Skincare Wand. Does not include the Skincare Wand; only the protective carrying case that perfectly fits the Radiatn Renewal Skincare Wand

products.title: 4-in-1 Red Light Therapy Skincare Wand & Activating Serum Kit
products.body_html:
Reduce the appearance of fine lines, dark circles, blemishes, and puffiness with our 7x award-winning Radiant Renewal 4-in-1 Skincare Wand!

Give yourself a spa-grade facial at-home or on-the-go!

The Wand combines four science-backed treatments: Red Light Therapy, Galvanic Current, Facial Massage, and Therapeutic Warmth for glowing, radiant skin in a matter of weeks.

This Kit includes our clean, non-comedogenic Skin Therapy Activating Serum to boost your treatment. It provides the perfect cushion and glide for your Solawave Wand, while leaving your skin with a velvety finish that layers seamlessly under the rest of your skincare routine. 

The serum is supercharged with Hyaluronic Acid + NonaPeptide-I + Ionic Mineral Complex to help deliver radiant, glowing skin. And it's Profoundly Clean - without sulfates, phthalates, parabens, PEGs, petroleum, fragrances, and artificial colorants.

Skin Therapy Activating Serum Full Ingredient List:
Water/aqua/eau, Glycerin, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, Diglycerin, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/c10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Polyacrylate, Nonapeptide-1, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Gluconate, Carbomer, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hydroxide, Glucose, Sodium Phosphate, Potassium, Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Disodium Phosphate

products.title: Skin Therapy Activating Serum
products.body_html:
This lightweight, non-greasy, and long-lasting formula provides the perfect cushion and glide for your Solawave Wand treatment, while leaving your skin with a velvety finish that layers seamlessly under the rest of your skincare routine. 

This new + improved formula lasts longer than our original serum (so you can use less), is boosted with age-defying ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid + NonaPeptide-I, and Ionic Mineral Complex & is specially formulated to enhance your Solawave Wand treatment. 

The serum’s ingredients are Profoundly Clean - developed without sulfates, phthalates, parabens, PEGs, petroleum, fragrances, and artificial colorants.

Full Ingredient List:
Water/aqua/eau, Glycerin, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, Diglycerin, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/c10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Polyacrylate, Nonapeptide-1, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Gluconate, Carbomer, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hydroxide, Glucose, Sodium Phosphate, Potassium, Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Disodium Phosphate

products.title: Renew Complex Activating Serum
products.body_html:
This Activating Serum is formulated to supercharge your Solawave Wand. In a 4-week consumer perception study where participants used the Solawave Wand and Renew Complex Serum together,

  • 93% of users reported visibly rejuvenated and glowing skin
  • 97% of users noticed healthier-looking and more hydrated skin

Infused with super ingredients like skin-plumping Hyaluronic Acid, soothing Aloe Vera, and calming Blue Tansy Oil, . Specially formulated to evenly distribute the Wand's galvanic current across your skin—boosting results.

Our Renew Complex Serum is vegan, cruelty-free, and fragrance-free. Produced in small batches in Los Angeles.

Subscribe to save 20% and get free shipping on every Renew Complex Serum order. Never run out of this skin-boosting serum with automatic shipments. Skip or cancel any time.

products.title: Glowing Skin Starter Set
products.body_html:
Get vibrant, dewy skin with our clean skincare line, powered by Solabiome - our proprietary blend of probiotics, peptides, and Triple Hyaluronic Acid. Nourishes & boosts your delicate skin barrier & microbiome for radiant skin.

Solabiome brings your skin back to a healthy, hydrated, thriving baseline so it’s ready to take on the world.

products.title: Pre- & Probiotic Nourishing Moisturizer
products.body_html:
Plump, hydrate, and promote dewy radiance while reducing the look of fine lines with a nourishing cream packed with collagen peptides, hyaluronic acid in 3 weights, and a powerful mushroom humectant that supports the skin barrier and microbiome.

Our Nourishing Moisturizer is made with Solabiome, a balancing complex formulated with Betaglucan, a mushroom mycelium humectant that may provide even more hydration than hyaluronic acid.

  • Triple Hyaluronic Acid
  • Polyglutamic Acid
  • Collagen Peptides
  • 5% Solabiome
  • Oil-Free
  • Fragrance-Free

Solabiome is a science-forward skincare collection that calls on a synergistic blend of pre- and probiotics & pleasantly potent, profoundly clean active ingredients that nourish your skin’s delicate microbiome—bringing it back to a healthy, hydrated, thriving baseline, for skin that’s prepped and ready to take on the world.

Ingredients:
Water/Aqua/Eau, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Panthenol, Hydrogenated Poly (C6-14 Olefin), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Vinyl Dimethicone, Beta-Glucan, Sparassis Crispa Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Polyglutamic Acid, Cetearyl Olivate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/ VP Copolymer, Sorbitan Olivate, Propanediol, Arginine, Carbomer, Allantoin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Caprylyl Glycol

products.title: Pre- & Probiotic Plumping Peptide Serum
products.body_html:
Dial up your daily skincare routine with a hyper-hydrating hyaluronic acid and plumping avocado peptides to rejuvenate the skin from below the surface.

Lightweight and delightfully layerable, our Plumping Peptide Serum calms skin on contact while Solabiome’s synbiotics (pre- & probiotics) reveal a visibly more radiant complexion.

products.title: Pre- & Probiotic Refreshing Jelly Mist
products.body_html:
A super-fine spritzable toner that lands lightly on skin and absorbs instantly, delivering balancing pre- and probiotics, surface-softening Pro Vitamin B5, and antioxidants Gota Kula and Vitamin E to instantly hydrate and protect skin from free radicals. Use after cleansing, before applying your serum, face oil, or moisturizer.

When using the Solawave 4-in-1 Skincare Wand, rehydrate the Renew Complex Activating Serum with just a few spritzes of Refreshing Jelly Mist.

products.title: Pre- & Probiotic Hydrating Gel Cleanser
products.body_html:
Prep your skin for peak product absorption with a soothing, ultra-clean hydrating foam cleanser that gently sweeps away makeup, excess oil, and environmental stressors from skin’s surface—without stripping the delicate microbiome.

Formulated from coconuts and mushroom extract, this cleanser helps bring your skin to a healthy baseline.

Our Hydrating Gel Cleanser is formulated with:

  • 1.2% Solabiome (our proprietary blend of Beta-glucan (prebiotic), probiotics, and mushroom-derived extract to help your skin retain moisture)
  • Pro-Vitamin B5 (a natural skin healer and protector)

It's made in South Korea, and Profoundly Clean (exceeding every global Clean Beauty standard). It is also Sulfate-Free, Fragrance-Free, Oil-Free, and non-comedogenic (won't clog pores).

Solabiome is a science-forward skincare collection that calls on a synergistic blend of pre- and probiotics & pleasantly potent, profoundly clean active ingredients that nourish your skin’s delicate microbiome—bringing it back to a healthy, hydrated, thriving baseline, for skin that’s prepped and ready to take on the world.

products.title: 4-in-1 Radiant Renewal Skincare Wand with Red Light Therapy
products.body_html:
Reducing the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, blemishes, and dark spots has never been easier!

Our new Skincare Wand was improved with feedback from our community, and features six major upgrades.

The Wand is more powerful, with 150% additional light for stronger Red Light Therapy results.

The Wand offers upgraded performance with Galvanic Current, which helps with the absorption of topical skincare products.

And the Wand provides enhanced comfort via Therapeutic Warmth and Facial Massage technologies, for a blissful self-care experience.

Includes Travel Case for better portability.

180 degree rotation of the Wand Head enables you to reach the contours of the face.

Now Water Resistant thanks to magnetic charging (ships with cable!)

products.title: Hydrating Sheet Mask
products.body_html: This hydrating water-gel sheet mask significantly boosts your skin’s moisture levels for an immediate glowing and plump appearance. Formulated to be profoundly clean, the mask nourishes your skin with a proprietary blend of Niacinamide, ProVitamin B5, Hyaluronic Acid, and Avocado Peptides. Fragrance-free, cruelty-free, vegan, and biodegradable.

products.title: Bye Acne: 3-Minute Pimple Spot Treatment
products.body_html:
Say goodbye to acne and blemish-causing bacteria and say hello to visibly clearer skin. Bye Acne is a light therapy spot treatment that effectively targets and treats mild-to-moderate acne in just 3 minutes per session.

This FDA-cleared acne-fighting powerhouse uses both Blue Light Therapy (415 nm) and Red Light Therapy (630 nm) to spot-treat blemishes at all stages of development. Bye Acne works to clear active pimples, prevent future breakouts, and calm redness and inflammation from acne-causing bacteria.

Rechargeable, ultra-portable and recommended for adults with mild-to-moderate acne. Results in as little as 1-3 sessions!

Ships with USB charging cable.
